ComicInfo.Title: Lost Beneath the Sewers Part Two; Mark Part 5
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 10:44:31. [CVDB237817] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:20:21. [Issue ID 174885]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lost Beneath the Sewers Part Two: Ed and Josie are lost beneath the sewers. Josie gets shot. The Professor and Ronald Reagan meet. Ed goes on the Adventures In Science TV Show.
Mark Part 5: Herod imprisons John the Baptist. Salom√© dances for Herod and then asks for John's head. Jesus and the disciples go away on a boat and meet a large crowd when they land. Jesus preaches and then multiplies loaves of bread and fish to feed the thousands around them. The disciples later head out to Bethsaida via boat but have difficulty rowing due to strong wind. The wind stops after Jesus walks on the water and gets on the boat. Later on Jesus chastises some Pharisees and scribes from Jerusalem for their hypocrisy concerning keeping the laws of men but rejecting God's commandments.
ComicInfo.Characters: Ronald Reagan (as Ed's penis),Fiona's Unnamed Husband,Fiona,Professor Jones,Fiona's Mom
